In this we can generate all valid pairs by inserting one more pair at beginning + after every left paren 
to all the valid pairs generated by previous number .

ex. for n = 2
 // first n = 1 : insert one pair ()
 // now for all pairs generated by n = 1 , 
 // for n=2 (one more pair) insert it at beginning + after every left paren 
 // so () = insertionOperation = > ()() , ( () )
 // final answer : ()() , ( () )
